response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price. Given its high value to you, I believe it's only fair to present it at a rate that reflects its true worth. I propose to sell the product to you for $100. This price not only ensures a good return for me but also allows you to acquire it at a reasonable premium compared to its market value. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and make the transaction beneficial for both of us.", "product_price": 100}
